name: Geese Rising
description:
Vampires took over years ago. Finally, Bibbo has found a way to get rid of them once and for all! Help Bibbo defeat the vampire menace with the help of the other farms in Geese Rising!

 *NOTE: DO NOT PRESS THE RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON*

A game made in 48 hrs. for Pizza Jam "Movement" by Mandotoro and myself.
